    • Constructor Detail

      • VerifooProxy

        public VerifooProxy(Graph graph,
                    Hosts hosts,
                    Connections conns,
                    CapacityDefinition capacityDefinition)
             throws BadGraphException
        Public constructor for the verifoo proxy service
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph that will be deployed on the network
        hosts - The list of hosts in the network
        conns - The connections between hosts
        capacityDefinition - The list of the capacity for each node that will be deployed
        Throws:
        BadGraphException

    • Method Detail

      • setConditions

        private void setConditions()
                    throws BadGraphException
        Sets all the conditions for the nodes. First, it sets up the host conditions. Then, it creates the conditions to make that a node is deployed only on one host. After that, it creates the condition that if an host has a node deployed on it, it has to be active. Lastly, it creates the conditions that the sum of the disk requirements of all the nodes deployed on an host, is less than disk capacity of that host
        Throws:
        BadGraphException

      • checkPhysicalNetwork

        private void checkPhysicalNetwork()
                           throws BadGraphException
        Checks if in the xml there are only one host client and one host server, then it calls the function to calculate all the possible paths from the host client to the host server
        Throws:
        BadGraphException

      • createHostChain

        private void createHostChain(java.lang.String hostClient,
                             java.lang.String hostServer)
        Calculates all the possible paths from the host client to the host server
        Parameters:
        hostClient -
        hostServer -

      • expandHostChain

        private boolean expandHostChain(java.lang.String lastHost,
                                java.lang.String hostServer,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> hostChain)
        Explores recursively all the possible paths
        Parameters:
        lastHost - the host from which it calculate the next for the recursion
        hostServer - is the final host of the network
        hostChain - List of all the hosts encountered in the current chain

      • checkNffg

        private void checkNffg()
                throws BadGraphException
        Checks if in the xml there are only one node that is a client and one node that is a server and they are for the same service (web or mail), then it calls the function to create the link from the node's neighbours. Lastly, it calls a function to create the routing tables
        Throws:
        BadGraphException

      • createLink

        private void createLink(Node prec,
                        Node current,
                        Node server)
                 throws BadGraphException
        Creates the link from the node's neighbours
        Parameters:
        prec - previous node in the chain
        current - current node in the chain
        server - the node that is the server of the chain
        Throws:
        BadGraphException

      • createRoutingTables

        private void createRoutingTables(Node client,
                                 Node server)
                          throws BadGraphException
        Creates the routing table by adding the rules by exploring for each possible path between an host client and host server all the possibles deploying scenarios for the nodes
        Parameters:
        client - the node client
        server - the node server
        Throws:
        BadGraphException

      • setNextHop

        private boolean setNextHop(Node source,
                           Node server,
                           int nChain,
                           int level,
                           java.lang.String hostServer)
                    throws BadGraphException
        Explores recursively all the possible solution for setting a next hop condition
        Parameters:
        source - the node from which is exploring the solutions
        server - the node server
        nChain - number of the host chain on which it is trying to deploy all the nodes
        level - on which host in the host chain it is trying to deploy the remaining nodes
        hostServer -
        Returns:
        true if the last node has been deployed on the host server (good path), false otherwise
        Throws:
        BadGraphException
